record.dc:title: 39BT2, 15BT2, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Mound. Progress photo.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Uncovering the primary mound by removal of the last of the secondary mound dirt - here a layer of 6 to 8 inches. In the foreground stakes have been reset in the primary mound surface. In lower right the loose mounded dirt covers a fire basin which has been excavated, photographed, noted, and temporarily refilled. In the background the mound is being reconstructed according to its original dimensions. View from south.
record.wpa:photograph_category: People Lab and Field Scenes; General Site and Excavation
